description: Use this API to upload images and support different business scenarios through business and scene parameters

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp and partner_key

parameters.name: business
parameters.description: Defines the business type of the uploaded image. Supported value: 2

parameters.name: scene
parameters.description: Defines the purpose of the uploaded image under the specified business type. Supported values: 1

parameters.name: images
parameters.description: The image files to be uploaded. Rules and restrictions by business and scene. If (business = 2 (Return)) and (scene = 1 (Return Package Image)), up to 3 images can be uploaded. Each image must be in JPG/JPEG format.

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: warning
response_fields.description: Indicate warning message you should take care

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: image_id
response_fields.description: Unique ID of the uploaded image
